scripts.start: concurrently --names BABEL,BROWSERIFY,LIVERELOAD,SERVE 'yarn build:watch' 'yarn build:browserify' 'yarn run livereload .' 'yarn serve-example' -c blue,magenta,green,white
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn run babel -- -d dist src
scripts.build:browserify: sleep 3 && yarn run watchify -- dist/index.js examples/index.js -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.release: git push origin master; git push --tags; npm publish
scripts.ci: yarn run lint && yarn run test
scripts.heroku-prebuild: yarn config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org && yarn install:peers
scripts.heroku-postbuild: yarn install --production=false && yarn run build && yarn run browserify -- dist/index.js examples/index.js -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.install:peers: yarn add -P $(jq -r '.peerDependencies | to_entries | map("\(.key)@\(.value | tostring)") | join(" ")' package.json)
